page.title: 02EDUCATION IN RHAYADER
page.content: The only school is{Rhayader Voluntary {Primary School}which has about 200 pupils with 9 teaching staff. Children start school at 4 years old and leave at 11 years to go to the High School at Llandrindod Wells 12 miles away. Lessons are taken in English with peripatetic Welsh and Music teachers. The extensive school grounds include cricket and football pitches, swimming pool and dry play area. The Parent- Teachers Association is very active in raising extra funds for the school. The local{Pre-School Playgroup}takes children from 3 years old and younger children have a{Mother and Toddler Group, both being run voluntarily. During the Autumn and Winter terms {evening classes}are held covering a wide range of subjects, including Bridge, Computing, Flower Arranging, Politics and Keep Fit.
